entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
